p:
The accuracy of F orClim in Europe has been shown, among others, by its ability to reproduce vegetation patterns and forest biomass along a broad climatic gradient
53, 54, 56 spanning 11 sites in central Europe. We have thus focused on these same 11 sites, i.e. sites with very different forest types (representative of central Europe forests) and with mean annual temperature ranging from 1.2 to 9.7 °C, and annual precipitation sums from 573 to 1,350 mm (see Table S1).
